adrFormatAddress: 247 W 11th St #103, New York, NY 10014-2212, USA

originalText.text: I recently visited Ecous Laser Boutique and had the pleasure of being assisted by Eka, who truly exceeded my expectations. Her approach is not only kind and efficient, but she also excels in communication, ensuring that I was comfortable and well-informed throughout my first experiences with laser hair removal. The results have been remarkable – even after just a few sessions, the effectiveness of the treatment is evident. I am thoroughly impressed with the service and outcomes at Ecous Laser Boutique and highly recommend them to anyone considering laser hair removal.

originalText.text:
I have had an incredible experience at Ecous Laser Boutique. I have gone through two sessions already and I am happy with the results and customer experience.

I am a man with very thick hair and a lot of it all over my body so I was extremely nervous before going through with the laser hair removal process. Eka did a great job in answering all of my questions and calming down any nerves I had of laser hair removal. Also, I guess my pain tolerance is very low and Eka was extremely patient and understanding as she was performing laser hair removal on me.

Overall, I’d recommend this boutique to anyone looking for laser hair removal. If you want a specialist who knows what she’s talking about, is empathetic, and can offer personalized care, look no further! I look forward to future sessions with Eka because she is the best at what she does!!

originalText.text: Eka is wonderful, calm, and kind. I’ve seen amazing results with her machine. She is extremely thorough and detailed, and it feels that she truly cares about her clients and their results. The place is very clean, comfortable, and hygienic. The prices are reasonable in comparison to many other laser places, and you have the option to purchase packages too. I have tried so many different lasers, including with top dermatologists, and this is by far the most effective.

originalText.text: Five-star experience with Eka for laser hair removal!! She is super communicative, easy-going and flexible. I felt very at ease during our sessions, which were professional, quick and somehow pain-less. I highly recommend if you are looking for someone to help you achieve your hair removal needs.

text.text: Five-star experience with Eka for laser hair removal!! She is super communicative, easy-going and flexible. I felt very at ease during our sessions, which were professional, quick and somehow pain-less. I highly recommend if you are looking for someone to help you achieve your hair removal needs.

originalText.text: Eka is amazing! She talks you through any questions you may have, checks in regularly throughout the treatment to make sure your tolerance is okay, and makes you feel at ease no matter what area of the body she's working on. She's also flexible on timing but keeps you on schedule so you get the best results possible- and the results are perfection! I've worked with Eka on a variety of body parts, and have had no pain or issues during/after any sessions. I'm also transgender and have hair growth patches that are not necessarily on the service menu or cover the full pricing area, and Eka has always worked with me  to accommodate. Her manner around sensitive areas/topics always makes me feel completely safe and comfortable, like she's an old friend from the first time meeting her. All around Eka makes laser hair removal the best experience possible and 10/10 would recommend booking with her!
